              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Note:</font> Regulation S-T Rule
101(b)(7) only permits the submission in paper of a Form 6-K if submitted to
furnish a report or other document that the registrant foreign private issuer
must furnish and make public under the laws of the jurisdiction in which the
registrant is incorporated, domiciled or legally organized (the registrant's
"home country"), or under the rules of the home country exchange on which the
registrant's securities are traded, as long as the report or other document is
not a press release, is not required to be and has not been distributed to the
registrant's security holders, and, if discussing a material event, has already
been the subject of a Form 6-K submission or other Commission filing on
EDGAR.</font></div>

by check mark whether by furnishing the information contained in this Form, the
registrant is also thereby furnishing the information to the Commission pursuant
to Rule 12g3-2(b) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.</font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><img src="logo.jpg" alt=""></div>

      </div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
      <div align="center">
        <table bgcolor="white" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
            <tr>
              <td valign="top" width="49%">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: right" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 54pt; COLOR: #ff0000; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #ff0000">ASE</font></font></div>
              </td>
              <td width="2%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ADVANCED</font></font></div>

1</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notice
for Meeting</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">To:
Shareholder ___________</font></div>

      <div>

            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Please
      note that we are scheduled to hold the 2009 Shareholders&#8217; General
      Meeting</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">on
Thursday, June 25, 2009 at 10:00 a.m. at Chuang-ching Hall, 600, Jia-chang Rd.,
NEPZ, Nantz Dist., Kaohsiung City. Major contents of the meeting shall
be:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Status
Report:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.1.1&#160;
&#160;&#160;Business report of 2008</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.1.2
&#160;&#160;&#160;Report by supervisors on review of the 2008 financial

              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 27pt">
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.5</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
      Proposals: Agreement to release the Company&#8217;s newly elected Directors from
      the non-competition restriction.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Extempore
Motions.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">For
      the Company&#8217;s 2008 surplus distribution, the Board of Directors has
      drafted a shareholder cash divided at NT$0.5 per share. Later, if the
      Company&#8217;s ECB holders exercise the right of conversion, or new shares
      issued to employees against Employee Stock Option warrant, or new shares
      issued by the Company for a cash capital increase, or buyback of the
      Company&#8217;s stocks, or transfer or cancellation of the Company&#8217;s treasury
      stocks, which affect the cash distribution rate of the shareholders&#8217;
      bonus, requiring adjustment, the management will request the shareholders&#8217;
      meeting to authorize the board of directors to handle the situation
      plenipotentiarily and make the adjustment
  accordingly.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">

      the </font></div>

of their own company or the company of a third party, the director should
explain the important details of these actions to the Shareholders&#8217; Meeting and
receive their permission. It is agreed to release the Company&#8217;s newly elected

      please report to the site on the date of meeting by filling out Coupon 2

      Proxy and Coupon 3 Sign-in Card in its full form, duly filled out, to the
      Company&#8217;s stock affairs agent, President Securities Corp. with attention
      to Department of Stock Affairs Agency 5 days prior to the meeting. Once
      the signature or seal is verified, the Company&#8217;s stock affairs agent will
      send back the Sign-in Card with the registration seal affixed to you your
      agent for attending the shareholders&#8217; general
  meeting.</font></div>

                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Addressee:</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Shareholder
      Name:</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Mailing
      Address of Shareholder:</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Name
      of Agent:</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Mailing
      Address of Agent:</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td valign="top" width="35%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
      proxy is provided in two different forms and shareholder may opt to choose
      one for use. However, if two forms are used simultaneously, it shall be
      deemed as carte blanche.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">

              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Before
      solicitation for proxy is made by other party, shareholders are advised to
      ask the solicitor to provide the information on the written and
      advertising contents or consult with the Company-compiled general
      information of the solicitor&#8217;s written and advertising contents in order
      to fully understand the background information of the solicitor and the
      candidate to be elected as well as the opinion toward the agenda by the
      solicitor.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>

      number or the uniform serial number in the Shareholder A/C
      Column.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>

      the proxy has been delivered to the Company and the shareholder wishes to
      personally attend the meeting, the concerned shareholder should notify the
      Company in writing at least one day prior to the shareholders&#8217; meeting to

              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">o</font> 1.
Ratify&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">o</font>
2. Oppose&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">o</font> 3. Abstain from
voting</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 27pt">
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.7</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Discussions
      of revision of the Company&#8217;s Articles of
  Incorporation</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">o</font> 1.

2. Oppose&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">o</font> 3. Abstain from

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 27pt">
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.8</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Re-election
      of Directors and Supervisors</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">

              </td>
              <td>
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Agreement

              </td>

        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">o</font> 1.

      this shareholder has not ticked any of the above motions, it shall mean
      ratification or endorsement of each and every
  motion.</font></div>
              </td>

              </td>

only).</font></div>

                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Meeting

                </td>
                <td>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Meeting
      ended</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2009
Annual Shareholders' Meeting Agenda</font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.
Time: Thursday, June 25, 2009 at 10 a.m.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.
Place: Zhuang Jing Auditorium, 600 Jiachang Rd., Nantz Processing Export Zone,
Nantz District, Kaohsiung City</font></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3.
Present : All shareholders and proxies</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.
Chairperson's Remarks</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.
Status Report</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;
1. 2008 Business Report</font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;
2. Supervisor&#8217;s Report on 2008 final financial statements</font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;
3. Report on total amount for endorsement, guarantee and amount of loans to
third parties</font></div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;
4. Report on the Company&#8217;s indirect investment on Mainland China and the
implementation thereof</font></div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;
5. Report on the Company&#8217;s buyback of its stock and the implementation
thereof</font></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.
Matters for Discussions</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        <div>

      Item 1:</font></div>
                      </div>

          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;
The Company's 2008 Business Report (proposed by the Board of
Directors)</font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Explanation:
Please see Attachment I for the 2008 Business Report attached to this<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>Agenda
Manual.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2.&#160;&#160;&#160; Supervisors'
Report on 2008 Actual Budget (proposed by the Board of Directors)
</font>Explanation: Please see Attachment II for the Supervisors&#8217; Report
attached to this<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>Agenda&#160;Manual.</font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        </div>
        <div>

                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Reason
      for not being completely implemented</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="24%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      order to protect the interests of all shareholders, the Company adopted
      the batch buyback strategy according to the share price change, so the
      buyback could not be completed according to the planned
      amount.</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="24%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      order to protect the interests of all shareholders, the Company adopted
      the batch buyback strategy according to the share price change, and since
      the Company&#8217;s share price clearly recovered since 03/04/2009, and for more
      efficient of capital using, the buyback could not be completed according
      to the planned
amount.</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Matters
for Ratification</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
1 (proposed by the Board of Directors)</font></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div>
            <div align="left">
              <div align="left">
                <div align="left">
                  <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                      <tr>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="11%">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Proposal:</font></div>
                        </td>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Please
      ratify the Company's report on 2008 final financial
      statements.</font></div>
                        </td>
                      </tr>
                      <tr>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                      </tr>
                      <tr>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="11%">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Explanation:</font></div>
                        </td>
                        <td valign="top" width="89%">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company's 2008 financial statements have been audited and attested by
      Deloitte &amp; Touche and reviewed by the Supervisors.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Please
      ratify the financial statements (see Attachment III to this Agenda Manual
      for details) and the 2008 Business Report (see Attachment I to this Agenda
      Manual for details).</font></div>
                        </td>
                      </tr>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">

        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div align="center">
          <div align="justify">
            <table bgcolor="white" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td width="11%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="5%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Note:</font></td>
                  <td width="84%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 16.55pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      shareholders&#8217; bonus distributed this time totaled NT$2,736,568,447 and all
      distributed in cash at NT$0.5 per share. With respect to the
      above-mentioned cash dividend rate, the calculation was based on the
      5,473,136,894 shares registered in the roster of shareholders as of March
      26, 2009, subtracting the treasury stock bought back by the Company.
      Later, if the Company&#8217;s ECB holders exercise the right of conversion, or
      new shares issued to employees against Employee Stock Option warrant, or
      new shares issued by the Company for a cash capital increase, or buyback
      of the Company&#8217;s stocks, or transfer or cancellation of the Company&#8217;s
      treasury stocks, which affect the cash distribution rate of the
      shareholders&#8217; bonus, requiring adjustment, the management will request the
      shareholders&#8217; meeting to authorize the board of directors to handle the
      situation plenipotentiarily and make the adjustment
      accordingly.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td width="11%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td width="5%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td width="84%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td width="11%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Resolution:</font></td>
                  <td width="5%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td width="84%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
            </table>

            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Matters
for Discussions</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div>
            <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                <tr valign="top">
                  <td style="WIDTH: 47.9pt">
                    <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td>
                    <div align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
      1 (Proposed by the Board of
Directors)</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="11%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Proposal:</font></div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="89%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">To
      meet the requirements for larger production capacity in future the Company
      needs to enrich its operation capital in order to repay bank loans or the
      needs for other long-term development use, thereby enabling the
      fund-raising channels more diversified and flexible. As such, the
      shareholders&#8217; meeting is requested to authorize the board of directors to
      opt at the optimal time, depending on the market situation and the status
      of capital needs of the Company and in accordance with existing laws and
      regulations, for capital increase in cash by issuing common shares or
      joining the issuance of GDR (Global depository receipts) or domestic
      capital increase in cash or issuance of domestic or ECB to raise fund. The
      case is being presented for discussions.</font></div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="89%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="11%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Explanation:</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="89%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160; </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      principles to authorize the board of directors to issue new common shares
      and GDR for capital increase in cash shall be as follows:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.1
      Issuance of common shares in the form GDR for capital increase in cash
      shall be limited to 500,000,000 shares only. The shareholders&#8217; meeting
      shall authorize the board of directors and the chairman of the board to
      make the adjustment by the market condition and issue the authorized GDR&#8217;s
      all at once.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.2
      In conducting issuance of new shares in the form of GDR for capital
      increase in cash, the issuance price shall be by the rules set forth in
      the Selfdiscipline Rules Concerning Subscription and Issuance of
      Securities by the Issuing Company Member Underwriters Have Assisted in the
      Process, i.e., the issuance price shall not be lower than the closing
      price of the Company&#8217;s common stock at the domestic open market. Take the
      simple arithmetic mean of the closing price of the common share on the
      first, third and fifth day prior to the price-setting day, minus 90% of
      the average stock price after gratuitous ex-rights and ex-interest, then
      comes the price for the new issue. However, the price-setting method may
      be duly adjusted if related domestic laws and regulations are updated.
      Since the stock price at home has often experience drastic volatility in
      the short run, the chairman of the board is authorized to set the actual
      issuance price within the above-mentioned price range, after having
      consulted with underwriter taking into consideration the international
      general practice, international capital market, domestic market price, the
      overall subscription status so as to make the offering price attractive to
      overseas investors. Consequently, the price-setting method should be
      reasonable. Additionally, the deciding method for the issuance price of
      GDR is based on the fair trading price of common shares at the domestic
      open market whereas the original stockholder may purchase the common
      shares at domestic stock exchange at the price close to the issuance price
      of the GDR, without bearing the exchange rate risk and liquidity risk.
      Moreover, the </font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
              <div id="FTR">
                <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">- 8
- -</font></div>
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                  <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="HDR">
                <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="11%"><font size="2">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="89%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">tranche
      of issuance of new shares and GRD for capital increase in cash do not
      affect much of the shareholders&#8217; equity as the highest dilution ratio in
      relation to the original shareholders&#8217; equity stands only at
      9.14%.</font></div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.3
      10% of common shares issued for capital increase in cash shall,
      according</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">to
      Article 267 of The Company Act, be reserved for subscription by company
      employees and the remaining 90% will be fully appropriated for open
      issuance as the securities for GDR as the original shareholders have
      waived their rights for subscription in accordance with Article 28-1 of
      the Securities Trading Act. For the part that employees have not
      subscribed, the chairman of the board is authorized to contact specific
      party for purchase or, depending on the market requirements, list as the
      original securities for participation in the issuance of GDR.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.4
      The proceeds for capital increase in cash from subscription to the GDR
      shall be used for overseas procurement of materials, enrichment of
      operation capital, repayment of bank loans, purchase of machinery and
      equipment, and/or spin-off in one or multiple use and is expected to
      complete the implementation within 2 years after the fund is fully raised.
      Implementation of the said plan is expected to intensify the Company&#8217;s
      competitiveness, enhance the benefit of the operation efficiency,
      producing positive benefit to</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">shareholders.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.5
      The board of directors is authorized to set the major contents of the
      capital increase in cash plan, which includes issuance price, number of
      shares issued, issuance conditions, source of capital, plan items, amount
      of fund raised, estimated progress and estimated probable effect generated
      as well as the issuance plan of participation in the issuance of
      GDR.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.6
      Once the plan for capital increase in cash is approve d by the competent
      regulatory authority, the board of directors will be authorized to proceed
      with matters related to issuance of new shares.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.7
      If the agreement on issuance time, issuance condition, issuance volume,
      issuance amount of capital increase in cash and participation in issuance
      of GDR as well as other matters related to capital increase in cash and
      participation in issuance of GDR needs update in future due to the
      decision by the competent regulatory authority and on the basis of
      operation evaluation, or the needs of objective environment, the board of
      directors shall be authorized to handle at its full
      discretion.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.8
      In conjunction with the issuance method of common shares for capital
      increase in cash and participation in GDR issuance, the chairman of the
      board or his designated representative is authorized to represent the
      Company in signing all documents related to the participation in the
      issuance of GDR as well as handling all needed matters related to the
      participation in the issuance&#160;</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
              <div id="FTR">
                <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">- 9
- -</font></div>
                <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                  <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                </div>
              </div>
              <div id="HDR">
                <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="11%"><font size="2">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="89%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">of
      GDR.</font></div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.9
      For matters that are not covered herein, the board of directors may, in
      accordance with law, proceed at its discretion.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The principles to authorize the
      board of directors to conduct capital increase in</font> <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">cash at home shall be as
      follows:</font></font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.1
      Number of new shares issued for capital increase in cash shall not be in
      excess of 500,000,000 shares.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.2
      The par value of the new shares for capital increase in cash shall be
      NT$10 each. Actual issuance price shall be by related rules set forth in
      the Selfdiscipline Rules Concerning Subscription and Issuance of
      Securities by the Issuing Company Member Underwriters Have Assisted in the
      Process and the market condition at the time of issuance. The chairman of
      she board and the underwriter may reach an agreement on the issuance in
      consideration of all the conditions mentioned above, which shall be
      subject to the approval by the competent regulatory authority before the
      issuance.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.3
      The issuance method of new shares for the capital increase in cash shall
      be by price enquiry and selected purchase. With the exception of 10%-15%
      reserved for employees as required by Article 267 of The Company Act, the
      rest will be offered for public issuance as all original shareholders have
      waived their rights to subscribe according to Article 28-1 of the
      Securities Trading Act. In addition, if the Company&#8217;s employees have not
      subscribed sufficiently and adequately or waived the right to subscribe,
      the chairman may contact specific party for purchase.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.4
      The proceeds for capital increase in cash from subscription to the GDR
      shall be used for overseas procurement of materials, enrichment of
      operation capital, repayment of bank loans, purchase of machinery and
      equipment, and/or spin-off in one or multiple use and is expected to
      complete the implementation within 2 years after the fund is fully raised.
      Implementation of the said plan is expected to intensify the Company&#8217;s
      competitiveness, enhance the benefit of the operation efficiency,
      producing positive benefit to shareholders.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.5
      The board of directors is authorized to set the major contents of the
      capital increase in cash plan, which includes issuance price, number of
      shares issued, issuance conditions, plan items, amount of fund raised,
      estimated progress and estimated probable effect generated as well as the
      issuance plan of participation in the issuance of GDR.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.6
      Once the plan for capital increase in cash is approve d by the competent
      regulatory authority, the board of directors will be authorized to set the
      base date for capital increase.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>

            <div>&#160;</div>
            <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="11%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="89%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.7
      With respect to the manner of issuance as mentioned in Section 2.3 above,
      the board of directors is authorized to make the amendment at its full
      discretion if amendment becomes necessary due to update of laws or
      regulations or the objective environment dictates the
      amendment.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.8
      For matters that are not covered herein, the board of directors may, in
      accordance with law, proceed at its discretion.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      principles to authorize the board of directors to conduct capital increase
      in cash by issuance of convertible corporate bond at home and ECB
      overseas:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.1
      Estimated number of shares for conversion: Not to exceed the number of
      shares registered in the application for update of the Company&#8217;s
      profit-seeing registration card.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.2
      Time of issuance: It depends on the capital needs by the Company and the
      market condition.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.3
      Interest rate: In principle, it shall be by the market interest rate then
      prevailing in the marketplace and reasonable, if possible.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.4
      Issuance duration: It depends on the capital needs by the
      Company</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.5
      Issuance condition: Subject to negotiation with the lead underwriter and
      existing laws and regulations.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.6
      The proceeds from subscriptions to the domestic convertible corporate bond
      and ECB overseas shall be used for overseas procurement of materials,
      enrichment of operation capital, repayment of bank loans, purchase of
      machinery and equipment, and/or spin-off in one or multiple use and is
      expected to complete the implementation within 2 years after the fund is
      fully raised. Implementation of the said plan is expected to intensify the
      Company&#8217;s competitiveness, enhance the benefit of the operation
      efficiency, producing positive benefit to shareholders.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.7
      The board of directors is authorized to set the issuance measures, amount
      of fund raised, plan items, estimated progress as well as estimated
      probable effect generated.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.8
      In conjunction with the issuance of the convertible corporate bond the
      chairman of the board or his designated representative is authorized to
      represent the Company in signing all documents related to the issuance of
      the convertible corporate bond as well as handling all needed matters
      related to the issuance of the convertible corporate bond.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.9
      For matters that are not covered herein, the board of directors may, in
      accordance with law, proceed at its discretion.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>

                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Resolution:</font></div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="89%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>

          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
2 (Proposed by the Board of Directors)</font></div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="13%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Proposal:</font></div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="87%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Please
      discuss the revised version of the Company&#8217;s Procedure for Acquisition or
      Disposal of Assets.</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="13%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Explanation:</font></div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="87%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;
      &#160;To increase the flexibility of the Company&#8217;s restructuring of the
      group&#8217;s organizational structure, the Company&#8217;s board of directors had
      passed a result on April 8, 2009 to revise Article 4 of the Company&#8217;s
      Procedure for Acquisition or Disposal of Assets.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;
      &#160;For details of the table of comparison of the revised provisions of
      the Procedure for Acquisition or Disposal of Assets, please refer to
      Attachment IV to this Agenda Manual. Your consent is
      solicited.</font></div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

      to Third Parties.</font></div>

                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      order to meet the requirements set forth by the revised Regulations
      Governing Loaning of Funds and Making of Endorsements/Guarantees by Public
      Companies announced by the Financial Supervisory Commission, Executive
      Yuan on January 15, 2009, it is planned to revise a portion of the
      articles of the Company&#8217;s Handling Procedure for Loans to Third Parties by
      resolution of the Board of Directors on April 8, 2009.</font></div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">For
      details of the table of comparison of the revised provisions of the
      Handling Procedure for Loans to Third Parties, please refer to Attachment
      V to this Agenda Manual. Your consent is
  solicited.</font></div>
                    </div>
                  </td>

          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div align="center">
          <div align="left">
            <table bgcolor="white" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td width="11%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Proposal:</font></td>
                  <td width="89%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Re-election
      of the Company&#8217;s directors and supervisors whose terms have
      expired</font></font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td width="11%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td width="89%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Explanation:</font></td>
                  <td width="89%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;In the current term, there are seven directors and five supervisors
      whose terms expire on June 21, 2009, who should be relected according to
      law.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      According to Article 16 of the Company&#8217;s Articles of Incorporation, the
      Company shall have seven to nine directors, of which two are independent
      directors and five to seven are non-independent directors, and there are
      also to be five to seven supervisors, with three-year terms.&#160;&#160;In
      this proposal, as resolved by the Company&#8217;s Board of Directors Meeting on
      April 8, 2009, nine directors, of which two are independent directors and
      seven are non-independent directors, as well as five supervisors, are to
      be elected at this Shareholders&#8217; Meeting. The terms of the new directors
      and supervisors will be for three years, from June 26, 2009, to June 25,
      2012.</font></div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;See below for the list of independent supervisor candidates and
      their information.</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
Proposals</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
