        <div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font>Attachment V</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Table
of Comparison of Revised Procedure for the the Company&#8217;s Handling Procedure for
Loans to Third Parties</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
          <div>
            <div align="center">
              <div align="center">
                <div align="center">
                  <div align="center">
                    <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                        <tr>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Article </font>1 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Subject</font></font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      handling procedure is established in order to protect the interests of the
      shareholders and to meet operational requirements and in accordance with
      the Regulations Governing Loaning of Funds and Making of
      Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies issued by the Securities &amp;
      Futures Information Center. Any matters that are not completely provided
      by the this handling procedure shall be handled according to the related
      laws and regulations.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      2: Loan recipients</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      recipients of loans made by the Company (hereafter referred to as
      &#8220;borrowers&#8221; shall be limited to the following. No loans may be made to
      shareholders or any other persons other than those listed
      below.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Companies and businesses that have business dealings with the
      Company.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Companies or businesses with short-term funding needs. For the purposes of
      this article, &#8220;short-term&#8221; means a maximum of one year or one business
      period.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      4 Maximum amount of loans</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Loans
      may only be made out of the Company&#8217;s own capital and working capital, and
      may only be made </font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1</font>
      Subject</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      handling procedure is established in order to protect the interests of the
      shareholders and to meet operational requirements and in accordance with
      the Regulations Governing Loaning of Funds and Making of
      Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies issued by the <font style="DISPLAY: inline">Financial Supervisory Commission, Executive Yuan
      (hereafter abbreviated as the FSC)</font>. Any matters that are not
      completely provided by the this handling procedure shall be handled
      according to the related laws and regulations.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      2: Loan recipients</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      recipients of loans made by the Company (hereafter referred to as
      &#8220;borrowers&#8221; shall be limited to the following. No loans may be made to
      shareholders or any other persons other than those listed
      below.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Companies and businesses that have business dealings with the
      Company.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Companies or businesses with short-term funding needs. For the purposes of
      this article, &#8220;short-term&#8221; means a maximum of one year or one business
      period.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Rule 2 shall not apply
      for loans made between the Company and foreign companies in which it has
      direct or indirect holdings of 100%.</font></font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: -63pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      4 Maximum amount of loans</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Loans
      may only be made out of the Company&#8217;s own capital and working capital, and
      may only be made if
</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>

          <div align="center">
            <div align="center">
              <div align="center">
                <div align="center">
                  <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                      <tr>
                        <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                        </td>
                        <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                        </td>
                      </tr>
                      <tr>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">if
      they are not prejudicial to the Company&#8217;s operational needs. The maximum
      size of loans shall be as follows:</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -6.6pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Cumulative total of all loans: The cumulative value of all loans made may
      not exceed 50% of the Company&#8217;s net worth in the most recent period. Loans
      made to companies or other businesses to meet short-term funding needed
      may not exceed 40% of the Company&#8217;s net worth.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Maximum size of loans made to an individual company or
      business:</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Loans made because of business dealings with the company or business
      concerned: Such loans may not exceed 20% of the Company&#8217;s net worth in the
      most recent period. Furthermore, because of risk management
      considerations, the loan size should not exceed the combined value of the
      transactions between the Company and the company or business in question
      over the past year.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Loans made to meet short-term funding needs may not exceed 20% of the
      Company&#8217;s net worth in the most recent period.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                        </td>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">they
      are not prejudicial to the Company&#8217;s operational needs. The maximum size
      of loans shall be as follows:</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Cumulative total of all loans: The cumulative value of all loans made may
      not exceed 50% of the Company&#8217;s net worth in the most recent period. Loans
      made to companies or other businesses to meet short-term funding needed
      may not exceed 40% of the Company&#8217;s net worth.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Maximum size of loans made to an individual company or
      business:</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Loans made because of business dealings with the company or business
      concerned: Such loans may not exceed 20% of the Company&#8217;s net worth in the
      most recent period. Furthermore, because of risk management
      considerations, the loan size should not exceed the combined value of the
      transactions between the Company and the company or business in question
      over the past year.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Loans made to meet short-term funding needs may not exceed 20% of the
      Company&#8217;s net worth in the most recent period.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Rule 1 and Rule 2 shall not apply to loans amounts
      for loans made between the Company and foreign companies in which it has
      direct or indirect holdings of 100%.</font></font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                        </td>
                      </tr>
                      <tr>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      5 Loan repayment period and calculation of interest</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      In principle, the repayment period for each cash loan shall be one year.
      In special circumstances, and with the approval of the board of directors,
      the repayment period may</font></div>
                        </td>
                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      5 Loan repayment period and calculation of interest</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      In principle, the repayment period for each cash loan shall be one year.
      In special circumstances, and with the approval of the board of directors,
      the repayment period may be extended; only

                        <tr>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">be
      extended; only one such extension shall be permitted, and the period of
      extension shall not exceed six months.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                          </td>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">one
      such extension shall be permitted, and the period of extension shall not
      exceed six months.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      A floating interest rate shall apply to cash loans, to be adjusted in
      accordance with the Company&#8217;s funding costs. The Finance Office will
      submit all proposals for interest rate adjustment to the President for
      approval; interest shall be paid calculated on a monthly
      basis.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font size="+0"><font size="+0"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Rule
      1 shall not apply to loan periods for loans made between the Company and
      foreign companies in which it has direct or indirect holdings of
      100%.</font></font></font></font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      8 Alterations to loans</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      there are changes in the objective environment after a capital loan is
      made that cause the loan amount to exceed the limit, an improvement plan
      should be drafted and submitted to the supervisors.</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      8 Alterations to loans</font> </font>

                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      there are changes in the objective environment after a capital loan is
      made that cause <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">the recipient to not
      meet the stipulations of these handling procedures or</font> the loan
      amount to exceed the limit, an improvement plan should be drafted and
      submitted to the supervisors<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">, and improvements
      should be completed according to the plan&#8217;s
  schedule</font></font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      10 Loan disclosure</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of capital loans with third parties made by the Company
      and its subsidiaries reaches 20% or more of the net value on the Company&#8217;s
      most recent financial report.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Where any of the following apply to the loans made by the Company, the
      Company shall make a public announcement of this fact within two days of
      the situation developing:</font></div>
                            <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      the balance of capital loans with third parties reaches 20% or more of the
      net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial report or every time the
      balance increases by 2% of the net value on the </font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      10 Loan disclosure</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of capital loans with third parties <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">made by
      the Company and its subsidiaries</font> </font>reaches 20% or more of the
      net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial report.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="left">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Where
      any of the following apply to the loans made by the Company, the Company
      shall make a public announcement of this fact within two days of the
      situation developing:</font></div>
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (1)&#160;&#160; When the balance of capital loans with third parties <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">made by
      the Company and its subsidiaries</font> </font>reaches 20% or more of the
      net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial
    report.</font></div>
                            </div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
            <div>
              <div align="center">
                <div align="center">
                  <div align="center">
                    <div align="center">
                      <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                          <tr>
                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Company&#8217;s
      most recent financial report after making a public announcement according
      to this rule.</font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      the balance of a capital loan to a single enterprise reaches 10% or more
      of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial report or every
      time the balance increases by 2% of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most
      recent financial report after making a public announcement according to
      this rule.</font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;
      &#160;When the balance of a capital loan to a single enterprise <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">made by
      the Company and its subsidiaries</font> </font>reaches 10% or more of the
      net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial
report.</font></div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      the loan balance of a capital loan made to an enterprise due to a business
      relationship exceeds the total amount of transactions made with said
      business dealings during the most recent year or every time the balance
      increases by 2% of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial
      report after making a public announcement according to this
      rule.</font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;&#160;
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">When the amount of new capital loans
      made by the Company or its subsidiaries reaches NT$10 million or more and
      also reaches 2% or more of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent
      financial report</font>.</font></font></div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When a subsidiary of the Company is not a domestic public company, and
      matters for which public announcement is required according to any of the
      above items occur for said subsidiary, the Company should do announce for
      them. The ratio of the subsidiary company&#8217;s capital loan balance to net
      value is calculated by the ratio of the subsidiary company&#8217;s capital loan
      balance to the Company&#8217;s net value.</font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When a subsidiary of the Company is not a domestic public company, and
      matters for which public announcement is required according to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Item 2.3</font> occur
      for said subsidiary, the Company should announce it for
    them.</font></div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Company shall evaluate its loan status in accordance with generally
      accepted accounting principles and shall allocated an appropriate bad debt
      reserve. The Company should disclose all relevant information in its
      financial statements, and should provide the Company&#8217;s </font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Company shall evaluate its loan status in accordance with generally
      accepted accounting principles and shall allocated an appropriate bad debt
      reserve. The Company should disclose all relevant information in its
      financial statements, and should provide the Company&#8217;s Auditor with
      </font></div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>
                      </table>
                    </div>

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                <div>
                  <div align="center">
                    <div align="center">
                      <div align="center">
                        <div align="center">
                          <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                              <tr>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Auditor
      with relevant information so that all relevant auditing procedures can be
      properly implemented.</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">relevant
      information so that all relevant auditing procedures can be properly
      implemented.</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      12 Procedures for the control of loans made by the Company&#8217;s subsidiaries
      to third parties</font></div>
                                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      a subsidiary of the Company plans to make a capital loan to a third party,
      the subsidiary should still draft a handling procedure for loans to third
      parties according to the stipulations of the Regulations Governing Loaning
      of Funds and Making of Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies issued
      by the Securities and Futures Institute.</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      12 Procedures for the control of loans made by the Company&#8217;s subsidiaries
      to third parties</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      If a subsidiary of the Company plans to make a capital loan to a third
      party, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">the
      Company should order</font> the subsidiary to draft a handling procedure
      for loans to third parties according to the stipulations of the
      Regulations Governing Loaning of Funds and Making of
      Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies issued by the <font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">FSC</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline">and it
      should be handled according to the drafted handling
      procedure.</font></font></font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The total loans made by a subsidiary may not exceed 40% of the
      subsidiary&#8217;s net value as given on its most recent financial statements;
      loans to any individual company or business may not exceed 20% of the
      subsidiary&#8217;s net value.</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The total loans made by a subsidiary may not exceed 40% of the
      subsidiary&#8217;s net value as given on its most recent financial statements;
      loans to any individual company or business may not exceed 20% of the
      subsidiary&#8217;s net value.</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Each subsidiary must, by the 10<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">th</font>
      day of each month, compiled a list giving details of all loans made to
      third parties in the previous month, and must submit the list to the
      Company.&#160;</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Each subsidiary must, by the 10<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">th</font>
      day of each month, compiled a list giving details of all loans made to
      third parties in the previous month, and must submit the list to the
      Company.</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Each subsidiary&#8217;s internal auditing personnel should, at least once every
      quarter, conduct an audit of the procedures for and implementation status
      of the subsidiary&#8217;s granting of loans to third parties, and keep a written
      record of this audit. If any major violations are discovered, the internal
      auditing personnel should immediately notify the subsidiary&#8217;s supervisors
      in writing, and should also notify the Company&#8217;s internal auditing
      personnel in writing.</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Each subsidiary&#8217;s internal auditing personnel should, at least once every
      quarter, conduct an audit of the procedures for and implementation status
      of the subsidiary&#8217;s granting of loans to third parties, and keep a written
      record of this audit. If any major violations are discovered, the internal
      auditing personnel should immediately notify the subsidiary&#8217;s supervisors
      in writing, and should also notify the Company&#8217;s internal auditing
      personnel in
writing.</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                          </table>
                        </div>
                      </div>

                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                                  </td>
                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                                  </td>
                                </tr>
                                <tr>
                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When visiting the Company&#8217;s subsidiaries to conduct auditing in accordance
      with the annual auditing plan, the Company&#8217;s internal auditing personnel
      should also examine the procedures used by each subsidiary for the
      granting of loans to third parties, and the loan implementation status. If
      any problems are discovered, these should be followed up and remedial
      action taken, and a follow-up report should be submitted to the
      President.</font></div>
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                  </td>
                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">
                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When visiting the Company&#8217;s subsidiaries to conduct auditing in accordance
      with the annual auditing plan, the Company&#8217;s internal auditing personnel
      should also examine the procedures used by each subsidiary for the
      granting of loans to third parties, and the loan implementation status. If
      any problems are discovered, these should be followed up and remedial
      action taken, and a follow-up report should be submitted to the
      President.</font></div>
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline">Rule 2 shall not apply to loan amounts for
      loans made between the Company and foreign companies in which it has
      direct or indirect holdings of 100%.</font></font></div>
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                  </td>
                                </tr>
                            </table>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </div>

              <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

            <div id="HDR">

        <div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Attachment VI</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Table
of Comparison of Revised Procedure for the Company&#8217;s Handling Procedure for
Endorsements and Guarantees</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
          <div>

              <div align="center">

                        <div align="center">
                          <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                              <tr>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      1&#160; Subjet</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      handling procedure is established in order to protect the interests of the
      shareholders and to meet operational requirements and in accordance with
      the Regulations Governing Loaning of Funds and Making of
      Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies issued by the Securities &amp;
      Futures Information Center. Any matters that are not completely provided
      by the this handling procedure shall be handled according to the related
      laws and regulations.</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                </td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      1&#160; Subjet</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      handling procedure is established in order to protect the interests of the
      shareholders and to meet operational requirements and in accordance with
      the Regulations Governing Loaning of Funds and Making of
      Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies issued by the <font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Financial
      Supervisory Commission, Executive Yuan (hereafter abbreviated as the
      FSC)</font>.</font> Any matters that are not completely provided by the
      this handling procedure shall be handled according to the related laws and
      regulations.</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -54pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      3&#160; The targets of endorsements and guarantees</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Company may only provide endorsements for the following:</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Firms with which the Company has business dealings.</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Firms in which the Company controls over 50% of the voting rights (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      A firm that controls over 50% of the voting rights in the Company (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -54pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      3&#160; The targets of endorsements and guarantees</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Company may only provide endorsements for the following:</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Firms with which the Company has business dealings.</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Firms in which the Company controls over 50% of the voting rights (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      A firm that controls over 50% of the voting rights in the Company (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;
      &#160;The above rules do not apply to endorsements made to companies in
      which contributing shareholders have a joint investment relationship
      according to their shareholding percentages, and it shall receive the
      endorsement.</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline">Companies in which the Company has direct or
      indirect holdings of 100% shall receive the
      endorsement.</font></font></div>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Rule 2</font>
      does not apply to endorsements made to companies in which <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">all</font>
      contributing shareholders have a joint investment relationship according
      to their shareholding percentages, and it shall receive the
      endorsement.</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">4.&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;The aforementioned
      contributions refer to the Company&#8217;s direct contributions or contributions
      made through companies in which the Company has direct or indirect
      holdings of
100%.</font></font></div>
                                </td>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div>
          <div align="center">
            <div align="center">
