                            <div align="center">
                              <div align="center">
                                <div align="center">
                                  <div align="center">
                                    <div align="center">
                                      <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                          <tr>
                                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                          </tr>
                                          <tr>
                                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      7 &#160;Exceeding the limits set for endorsements and guarantees, and
      alteration of endorsements and guarantees</font></div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Where operational requirements make it necessary
      for the Company to exceed the limits specified in Article 4 above when
      providing endorsements or guarantees, this must be approved by the board
      of directors, and at least 50% of the members of the board of directors
      must sign a joint guarantee to make good any loss that the Company may
      suffer as a result; furthermore, the Operational Procedures for
      Endorsements and Guarantees must be revised and submitted to the
      Shareholders Meeting for retroactive approval. If the Shareholders Meeting
      does not agree to the revision, then plans must be drawn up to eliminate
      the excess amount within a specified time limit. If the Company has
      appointed Independent Directors, then full consideration should be given
      to the views of these Independent Directors when the matter is being
      discussed by the Board of Directors; whether the Independent Directors
      agree or disagree (and the reasons for their disagreement in the latter
      case) should be recorded in the minutes of the board
    meeting.</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      7&#160; Exceeding the limits set for endorsements and guarantees, and
      alteration of endorsements and guarantees</font></div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Where operational requirements make it necessary
      for the Company to exceed the limits specified in Article 4 above when
      providing endorsements or guarantees, this must be approved by the board
      of directors, and at least 50% of the members of the board of directors
      must sign a joint guarantee to make good any loss that the Company may
      suffer as a result; furthermore, the Operational Procedures for
      Endorsements and Guarantees must be revised and submitted to the
      Shareholders Meeting for retroactive approval. If the Shareholders Meeting
      does not agree to the revision, then plans must be drawn up to eliminate
      the excess amount within a specified time limit. If the Company has
      appointed Independent Directors, then full consideration should be given
      to the views of these Independent Directors when the matter is being
      discussed by the Board of Directors; whether the Independent Directors
      agree or disagree (and the reasons for their disagreement in the latter
      case) should be recorded in the minutes of the board
    meeting.</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                          </tr>
                                          <tr>
                                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                          </tr>
                                          <tr>
                                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When recipients of the Company&#8217;s endorsements originally meet the
      stipulations of Article 3 and then fail to meet them later,&#160;&#160;or
      when the&#160;&#160;endorsement amount exceeds the amount set in Article 4
      because of a basic change in the calculated limit, this recipient&#8217;s
      endorsement amount or the excessive portion should be fully canceled when
      the contract term expires or within a certain period of time in a
      separately agreed upon plan, and the related improvement plan should be
      submitted to the supervisors.</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                            <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When recipients of the Company&#8217;s endorsements originally meet the
      stipulations of Article 3 and then fail to meet them later,&#160;&#160;or
      when the&#160;&#160;endorsement amount exceeds the amount set in Article 4
      because of a basic change in the calculated limit, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">an improvement plan
      should be set for</font> this recipient&#8217;s endorsement amount or the
      excessive portion, the related improvement plan should be submitted to the
      supervisors, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">and
      improvements should be completed ccording to the plan&#8217;s
      schedule.</font></font></div>
                                            </td>
                                          </tr>
                                          <tr>
                                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -54pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      9:&#160; Disclosure of endorsements and guarantees</font></div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The
      Company shall, by the 10<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">th</font>
      day of each month, make a public announcement of the total amount of
      endorsements and guarantees provided by the Company and its subsidiaries
      in the previous month</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                            <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -54pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      9:&#160; Disclosure of endorsements and guarantees</font></div>
                                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Company shall, by the 10<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">th</font>
      day of each month, make a public announcement of the total amount of
      endorsements and guarantees provided by the Company and its subsidiaries
      in the previous month</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                          </tr>
                                      </table>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>&#160;</div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>

                            <div align="center">

                                <div align="center">
                                  <div align="center">
                                    <div align="center">
                                      <div align="center">
                                        <div align="center">
                                          <div align="center">
                                            <div align="center">
                                              <div align="center">
                                                <div align="center">
                                                  <div align="center">
                                                    <table align="center" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;Where any of the following apply to the endorsements and guarantees
      provided by the Company, the Company shall make a public announcement of
      this fact within two days of the situation developing:</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;Where any of the following apply to the endorsements and guarantees
      provided by the Company, the Company shall make a public announcement of
      this fact within two days of the situation developing:</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of endorsements reaches 50% or more of the net value on
      the Company&#8217;s most recent financial report or every time the balance
      increases by 5% of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial
      report after making a public announcement according to this
      rule.</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of endorsements <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">made by the Company and its
      subsidiaries</font> </font>reaches 50% or more of the net value on the
      Company&#8217;s most recent financial report.</font></div>
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                          </td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of endorsements made to a single enterprise reaches 20%
      or more of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial report or
      every time the balance increases by 5% of the net value on the Company&#8217;s
      most recent financial report after making a public announcement according
      to this rule.</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of endorsements made <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">by the Company and its
      subsidiaries</font> </font>to a single enterprise reaches 20% or more of
      the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial report.</font></div>
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                          </td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of endorsements made to a single enterprise reaches NT$10
      million or more, and the total of the endorsements, long-term investments,
      and capital loans reaches 30% or more of the net value on the Company&#8217;s
      most recent financial report or every time the balance increases by 5% of
      the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial report after making a
      public announcement according to this rule.</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of endorsements made <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">by the Company and its sub</font><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">sidiaries</font></font> to a single
      enterprise reaches NT$10 million or more, and the total of the
      endorsements, long-term investments, and capital loans reaches 30% or more
      of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial
report</font></div>
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                          </td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(4)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When the balance of endorsements made to an enterprise due to a business
      relationship exceeds the total amount of transactions made with said
      business dealings during the most recent year or every time the balance
      increases by 5% of the net value on the Company&#8217;s most recent financial
      report after making a public announcement according to this
      rule.</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(4)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">When the amount
      of endorsements made by the Company or its subsidiaries reaches NT$30
      million or more and also reaches 5% or more of the net value on the
      Company&#8217;s most recent financial report.</font></font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                        <tr>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When a subsidiary of the Company is not a domestic public company, and
      matters for which public announcement is required according to any of the
      above items occur for said subsidiary, the Company should do announce for
      them. The ratio</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When a subsidiary of the Company is not a domestic public company, and
      matters for which public announcement is required according to <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Item
      2.4</font> </font>occur for said subsidiary, the Company should announce
      it for them.</font></div>
                                                          </td>
                                                        </tr>

                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;&#160;&#160;of the subsidiary company&#8217;s endorsement balance to net
      value is calculated by the ratio of the subsidiary company&#8217;s endorsement
      balance to the Company&#8217;s net value.</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Company shall undertake a quarterly appraisal and writing down of all
      contingent loss deriving from endorsements and guarantees, in accordance
      with the provisions of the Financial Reporting Standards Gazette No. 9,
      and shall appropriate disclosure of such contingent loss in its financial
      statements; the Company shall also provide its Auditor with relevant
      information to carry out all necessary auditing
procedures.</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Company shall undertake a quarterly appraisal and writing down of all
      contingent loss deriving from endorsements and guarantees, in accordance
      with the provisions of the Financial Reporting Standards Gazette No. 9,
      and shall appropriate disclosure of such contingent loss in its financial
      statements; the Company shall also provide its Auditor with relevant
      information to carry out all necessary auditing
  procedures.</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      11&#160;&#160; Procedure for the Control of Handling of Endorsements by
      Subsidiaries</font></div>
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      If a subsidiary of the Company plans to endorse a third party or provide
      an endorsement, the subsidiary should still draft a handling procedure for
      endorsements and guarantees according to the stipulations of the
      Regulations Governing Loaning of Funds and Making of
      Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies issued by the Securities &amp;
      Futures Information Center.</font></div>
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      11&#160;&#160; Procedure for the Control of Handling of Endorsements by
      Subsidiaries</font></div>
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;If a subsidiary of the Company plans to endorse a third party or
      provide an endorsement, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">the Company should
      order</font> the subsidiary to draft a handling procedure for endorsements
      and guarantees according to the stipulations of the Regulations Governing
      Loaning of Funds and Making of Endorsements/Guarantees by Public Companies
      issued by the <font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">FSC</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline">and it
      should be handled according to the drafted handling
      procedure.</font></font></font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The
      total amount of endorsements and guarantees provided by a subsidiary may
      not exceed 100% of the subsidiary&#8217;s net worth as given in its most recent
      financial statements; endorsements and guarantees provided to any
      individual firm may not exceed 70% of the subsidiary&#8217;s net
      worth.</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;
      &#160;The total amount of endorsements and guarantees provided by a
      subsidiary may not exceed 100% of the subsidiary&#8217;s net worth as given in
      its most recent financial statements; endorsements and guarantees provided
      to any individual firm may not exceed 70% of the subsidiary&#8217;s net
      worth.</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Each subsidiary shall, by the 10<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">th</font>
      day of each month, compile a list of all endorsements and guarantees
      provided in the previous month, and shall submit the list to the
      Company.</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;
      &#160;&#160;Each subsidiary shall, by the 10<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">th</font>
      day of each month, compile a list of all endorsements and guarantees
      provided in the previous month, and shall submit the list to the
      Company.</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Each subsidiary&#8217;s internal auditing personnel should, at least once every
      quarter, conduct an audit of the procedures for and implementation status
      of the subsidiary&#8217;s granting of endorsements and guarantees, and keep a
      written record of this audit. If any major violations are discovered, the
      internal auditing personnel should immediately notify the subsidiary&#8217;s
      supervisors in</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                  <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#160;Each subsidiary&#8217;s internal auditing personnel should, at least once
      every quarter, conduct an audit of the procedures for and implementation
      status of the subsidiary&#8217;s granting of endorsements and guarantees, and
      keep a written record of this audit. If any major violations are
      discovered, the internal auditing personnel should immediately notify the
      subsidiary&#8217;s</font></div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                            </table>
                                                                          </div>
                                                                        </div>
                                                                      </div>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                </div>
                                                              </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                          </div>
                                                        </div>
                                                      </div>
                                                    </div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </div>
                                              </div>
                                            </div>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                      </div>
                                    </div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

                                                                                            <tr>
                                                                                              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                                                                                              </td>
                                                                                              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                                                                                              </td>
                                                                                            </tr>
                                                                                            <tr>
                                                                                              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 7.55pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;
      writing, and should also notify the Company&#8217;s internal auditing personnel
      in writing.</font></div>
                                                                                              </td>
                                                                                              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: -1.3pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      supervisors in writing, and should also notify the Company&#8217;s internal
      auditing personnel in writing.</font></div>
                                                                                              </td>
                                                                                            </tr>
                                                                                            <tr>
                                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When visiting the Company&#8217;s subsidiaries to conduct auditing in accordance
      with the annual auditing plan, the Company&#8217;s internal auditing personnel
      should also examine the procedures used by each subsidiary for the
      granting of endorsements and guarantees, and the implementation status. If
      any problems are discovered, these should be followed up and remedial
      action taken, and a follow-up report should be submitted to the
      President.</font></div>
                                                                                              </td>
                                                                                              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      When visiting the Company&#8217;s subsidiaries to conduct auditing in accordance
      with the annual auditing plan, the Company&#8217;s internal auditing personnel
      should also examine the procedures used by each subsidiary for the
      granting of endorsements and guarantees, and the implementation status. If
      any problems are discovered, these should be followed up and remedial
      action taken, and a follow-up report should be submitted to the
      President.</font></div>
                                                                                              </td>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font>Attachment VII</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Table
of Comparison of the Revised Articles of Incorporation</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
        <div>
          <div align="center">
            <div align="center">
              <div align="center">
                <div align="center">
                  <div align="center">
                    <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                        <tr>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      24</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company is currently in the business growth stage. To meet the capital
      needs for business development now and in the future and satisfy the
      requirements of shareholders for cash inflow, the Company&#8217;s dividend
      policy shall use residual dividend policy to distribute dividends, of
      which the cash dividend distribution rate is 0%&#8211;50% of the total dividend
      amount, with the remainder to be distributed as stock dividends. However,
      depending on factors such as the economic situation, business development,
      and cash position holdings, the Company shall adjust the cash dividend and
      stock dividend distribution rate when necessary with a surplus
      distribution plan made by the Board of Directors and passed by resolution
      of the Shareholders&#8217; Meeting.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                          </td>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      24</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company is currently in the business <font size="+0"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">stability</font>
      </font></font>stage. To meet the capital needs for business development
      now and in the future and satisfy the requirements of shareholders for
      cash inflow, the Company&#8217;s dividend policy shall use residual dividend
      policy to distribute dividends, of which the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">cash dividend
      distribution rate is not lower than 30% of the total dividend
      amount</font>, with the remainder to be distributed as stock dividends. A
      surplus distribution plan is also to be made by the Board of Directors and
      passed by resolution of the Shareholders&#8217; Meeting.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      27</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">These
      Articles of Incorporation have been approved by the Promoters&#8217; Meeting,
      and came into effect on March 11, 1984.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-third amendment was made on June 21, 2006.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fourth amendment was made on June 28, 2007.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fifth amendment was made on June 19, 2008.</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      27</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">These
      Articles of Incorporation have been approved by the Promoters&#8217; Meeting,
      and came into effect on March 11, 1984.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      first amendment was made on May 3, 1984.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fourth amendment was made on June 28, 2007.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fourth amendment was made on June 28, 2007.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fifth amendment was made on June 19, 2008.</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-sixth amendment was made on June 25,
  2009.</font></div>
                          </td>
