        <div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font>Appendix I</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Rules
of Procedure for the Shareholders&#8217; Meeting</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <div align="left">
            <div align="left">
              <div align="left">
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left">
                    <div align="left">
                      <div align="left">
                        <div align="left">
                          <div align="left">
                            <div align="left">
                              <div align="left">
                                <div align="left">
                                  <div align="left">
                                    <div align="left">
                                      <div align="left">
                                        <div align="left">
                                          <div align="left">
                                            <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Shareholders&#8217; Meeting of the Company shall be conducted in accordance with
      the Rules specified herein.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Attending
      shareholders (or their proxies) shall wear attendance badges, and shall
      submit sign-in cards in lieu of signing in. The number of voting right
      shall be calculated according to the sign-in cards submitted.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      as stipulated in Article 179 of The Company Act whereas there are shares
      that have no voting right for shareholders of the Company, there is one
      vote for each share. When a shareholder is unable to attend the
      shareholders&#8217; meeting for whatever the reason, the shareholder may present
      a proxy statement printed by the Company that states the scope of
      authorization to entrust a proxy to attend the shareholders&#8217; meeting. With
      the exception of trust enterprises or stock affair agencies approved by
      competent securities authorities concerned, the votes that may be cast by
      one proxy representing two or more shareholders shall not exceed three
      percent of the votes of total shares issued; any votes in excess of that
      limit shall not be counted.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      venue for the shareholders&#8217; meeting shall be where the Company is located
      or a place convenient for shareholders to attend and suitable for
      convening the shareholders&#8217; meeting. The beginning time for the meeting
      may not be earlier than 9 a.m. or later than 3 p.m.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      otherwise provided by The Company Act, the shareholders&#8217; meeting shall be
      convened by the board of directors and presided by the chairperson. If the
      chairperson is on leave or unable to exercise the official function for
      whatever the reason, Article 208 Paragraph 3 of The Company Act shall
      govern. If the shareholders&#8217; meeting is convened by someone entitled to
      convene such a meeting who is not a member of the board of directors, the
      meeting shall be presided by the convening person. Where there are two or
      more persons entitled to convene the shareholders&#8217; meeting, they shall
      nominate among them one person to preside the
  meeting.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                            </table>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                      </div>
                                    </div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">- 52 -</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
          <div>
            <div align="left">
              <div align="left">
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left">
                    <div align="left">
                      <div align="left">
                        <div align="left">
                          <div align="left">
                            <div align="left">
                              <div align="left">
                                <div align="left">
                                  <div align="left">
                                    <div align="left">
                                      <div align="left">
                                        <div align="left">
                                          <div align="left">
                                            <div align="left">
                                              <div align="left">
                                                <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                    <tr>
                                                      <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">6.</font></div>
                                                      </td>
                                                      <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company may appoint the retained lawyers, certified public accountants or
      relevant personnel to attend the shareholders&#8217; meeting. The staff handling
      administrative affairs of the shareholders&#8217; meeting shall wear
      identification badges or arm-bands.</font></div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                      </td>
                                                    </tr>
                                                    <tr>
                                                      <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">7.</font></div>
                                                      </td>
                                                      <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company shall record the whole course of the shareholders&#8217; meeting on
      audio tape or video tape, and shall keep the tapes on file for at least
      one year.</font></div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                      </td>
                                                    </tr>
                                                    <tr>
                                                      <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.85pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.</font></div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                      </td>
                                                      <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      the time comes for the shareholders&#8217; meeting to begin, the chairperson
      shall immediately call the meeting in session. However, if the
      shareholders present represent less than half of the total issued shares,
      the chairperson may postpone the commencement of the meeting. The meeting
      may be postponed up to twice, and the total duration of postponement may
      not exceed one hour. If after two postponements the number of shareholders
      present is still insufficient while the shareholders present do represent
      at least one third of the total issued shares, provisional resolutions may
      be adopted in accordance with Article 175 Paragraph 1 of the Company Act.
      If prior to the end of the meeting the shareholders present have
      represented at least half of the total issued shares, the chairperson may
      resubmit the provisional resolutions adopted by the meeting for a vote in
      accordance with Article 174 of The Company Act.</font></div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                      </td>
                                                    </tr>
                                                    <tr>
                                                      <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">9.</font></div>
                                                      </td>
                                                      <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Where
      the shareholders&#8217; meeting is convened by the board of directors, the
      meeting agenda shall be set by the board of directors. The meeting shall
      proceed in accordance with the agenda, which may not be altered unless by
      the resolution of the shareholders&#8217; meeting.</font></div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      the shareholders&#8217; meeting is convened by someone entitled to convene such
      a meeting who is not a member of the board of directors, the rules of the
      preceding paragraph shall apply mutatis mutandis.</font></div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      by the resolution of the shareholders&#8217; meeting, the chairperson may not
      declare the meeting ended until all items on the agenda (including
      extemporaneous motions) arranged in the preceding two paragraphs have been
      completed.</font></div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">After
      the meeting is declared ended, shareholders may not elect a chairperson to
      resume the meeting at the original location or other premises, unless such
      declaration by the chairperson has violated the rules of procedure,
      whereas one person may be elected the chairperson with the consent of one
      half of the votes represented by shareholders present to resume the
      Meeting.</font></div>
                                                      </td>
                                                    </tr>
                                                </table>
                                              </div>
                                            </div>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                      </div>
                                    </div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
            <div id="FTR">
              <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">- 53 -</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div>
              <div align="left">
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left">
                    <div align="left">
                      <div align="left">
                        <div align="left">
                          <div align="left">
                            <div align="left">
                              <div align="left">
                                <div align="left">
                                  <div align="left">
                                    <div align="left">
                                      <div align="left">
                                        <div align="left">
                                          <div align="left">
                                            <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">10.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      the shareholders&#8217; meeting is in session, the chairperson may in his/her
      discretion allocate and announce time for breaks.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">11.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Before
      a shareholder present at the meeting speaks, he/she shall first fill out a
      statement slip stating therein the main points of the statement, the
      shareholder's account number (or the attendance identification number) and
      account name, so that the chairperson may determine the order of speaking.
      The shareholder present at the meeting that merely submits a statement
      slip without speaking is considered not having spoken. If the contents of
      the statement do not conform to the contents of the statement slip, the
      contents of the statement shall govern. Unless given consent by the
      chairperson and the speaking shareholder, the other shareholders may not
      speak to interrupt when a shareholder is speaking; otherwise the
      chairperson shall stop the interruption.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">12.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      permitted by the chairperson, no shareholder may speak for more than twice
      regarding the same proposal, and shall not last for more than five minutes
      each time. </font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      a shareholder violates rules under the preceding paragraph or goes beyond
      the scope of topics for discussion in speaking, the chairperson may stop
      him/her from speaking.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">13.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      an institutional person attends the shareholders&#8217; meeting as a proxy, the
      institutional person may assign only one representative to attend the
      meeting. When an institutional shareholder assigns two or more
      representatives to attend the shareholders&#8217; meeting, only one of them may
      speak for any single proposal.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">14.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">After
      a shareholder present at the meeting speaks, the chairperson may reply in
      person or assign concerned personnel to reply.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">With
      respect to discussions of a proposal, if the chairperson feels that a
      consensus has been reached where a vote can be taken on the proposal,
      he/she may announce that the discussions shall cease and the proposal be
      submitted for a vote.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">16.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      chairperson shall appoint monitors and ballot counters for voting on
      proposals. For qualifications, monitors must be shareholders. The results
      of each vote shall be announced on the spot and made into the
      minutes.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                            </table>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                      </div>
                                    </div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          </div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
            <div id="FTR">
              <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">- 54 -</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
            <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
              <div>
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left">
                    <div align="left">
                      <div align="left">
                        <div align="left">
                          <div align="left">
                            <div align="left">
                              <div align="left">
                                <div align="left">
                                  <div align="left">
                                    <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                        <tr>
                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.</font></div>
                                          </td>
                                          <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      otherwise provided by The Company Act or the Company&#8217;s Articles of
      Incorporation, a proposal shall be approved by the consent of more than
      half of the votes of shares represented by shareholders present. In
      voting, a proposal is considered approved if the chairperson receives no
      dissenting opinions after requesting, which has the same effect as does
      voting by ballot.</font></div>
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                          </td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">18.</font></div>
                                          </td>
                                          <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Where
      there is an amendment or an alternative for a proposal, the chairperson
      shall determine the order in which they are to be voted on with the
      original proposal. If any of the proposals has been approved, the other
      shall be treated as rejected and not be voted on separately.</font></div>
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                          </td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">19.</font></div>
                                          </td>
                                          <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      chairperson may instruct the inspectors (or security personnel) to assist
      in maintaining order in the meeting venue. While assisting in maintaining
      order at the venue, the inspectors (or security personnel) shall wear
      arm-bands reading &#8220;Inspector.&#8221;</font></div>
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                          </td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">20.</font></div>
                                          </td>
                                          <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">All
      matters not provided by these Rules herein shall be handled in accordance
      with The Company Act, relevant laws and regulations, as well as the
      Company&#8217;s Articles of Incorporation.</font></div>
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                          </td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.5pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">21.</font></div>
                                          </td>
                                          <td valign="top" width="95%">
                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">These
      Rules shall come into force given the approval of the shareholders&#8217;
      meeting, and so shall be the
amendment.</font></div>
                                          </td>
                                        </tr>
                                    </table>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
            <div id="FTR">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
              </div>
              <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
            </div>
            <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">- 55 -</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 378pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: right" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font>Appendix II</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Guidelines
for the Election of Directors and Supervisors</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <div align="left">
            <div align="left">
              <div align="left">
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left">
                    <div align="left">
                      <div align="left">
                        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      1</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Elections
      of the Company&#8217;s Directors and Supervisors, except where otherwise
      stipulated in the Company Act, the Securities Exchange Law, and the
      Company&#8217;s Articles of Incorporation, shall be handled according to these
      guidelines.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      2</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">At
      the time of election of the Company&#8217;s Directors and Supervisors, every
      share has the same voting rights as the number of people who should elect
      Directors and Supervisors, and ballots equal to the number of people who
      should elect Directors and Supervisors will be prepared by the Board of
      Directors and distributed to the shareholders.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      3</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Those
      that receive more ballots that represent voting rights shall be elected,
      respectively, as the Company&#8217;s independent Directors, non-independent
      Directors, or Supervisors, according the quota set in the Company&#8217;s
      Articles of Incorporation. If two or more people receive the same number
      of voting rights and the set quota has been exceeded, the situation will
      be resolved by drawing lots. Those that are not present will be
      represented by the chairperson in drawing lots. If one natural person is
      simultaneously elected as a Director and a Supervisor, that person should
      decide for themselves if they should serve as a Director or a Supervisor.
      If a government or corporate shareholder or their designated
      representative is simultaneously elected as a Director and a Supervisor,
      the same applies. If after investigation of the personal information of an
      elected Director or Supervisor they are found to not meet the
      qualifications of serving as a Director or Supervisor or if their election
      is made invalid by the relevant laws and regulations, any open slot will
      be filled by the elected with the most ballots from the original election
      and announced at the current Shareholder&#8217;s Meeting.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      4</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      the election begins, all related tasks are to be executed by the ballot
      examiner and ballot counting personnel designated by the
      Chairman.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      5</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      a candidate is a shareholder, the voter must clearly indicate the
      candidate&#8217;s account name and shareholder account number in the &#8220;candidate&#8221;
      field on the ballot. If the candidate is not a shareholder, they should
      clearly indicate the candidate&#8217;s name and ID number. When a candidate is a
      government agency or corporate shareholder, the name of the government
      agency or corporation should be clearly indicated in the candidate field
      on the ballot, and the name of the government agency&#8217;s or corporation&#8217;s
      representative must also be clearly indicated. When there is more than one
      representative, their names should be separately
  indicated.</font></div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                        </table>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">- 56 -</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><br>&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div>
            <div align="left">
              <div align="left">
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left">
                    <div align="left">
                      <div align="left">
                        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      6</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ballots
      will be seen as invalid in the following circumstances:</font></div>
                                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ballots
      that do not follow the stipulations of these Guidelines.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ballots
      that are not inserted in the ballot box or blank ballots that have not
      been filled out.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Illegible
      ballots with unclear markings.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      the candidate is a shareholder and their account name and shareholder
      account name do not match the Register of Shareholders; if the candidate
      is not a shareholder, and their name and ID number do not match after
      checking.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ballots
      with additional writing in addition to indicating the candidates&#8217;s account
      name (or name) or shareholder account number (or ID number) and the voting
      rights amount.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">6.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ballots
      in which the candidate&#8217;s account name (or name) or shareholder account
      number (or ID number) are not filled out.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">7.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">A
      ballot on which two or more candidates are indicated.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      7</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">After
      all of the ballots have been put into the ballot box, the ballot box is to
      be opened by the ballot examiner.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      8</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      there is any confusion about a ballot, the ballot examiner will check to
      see if it is voided. Voided ballots will be stored separately, and after
      the ballots are counted and the number of votes and voting rights amounts
      are tallied, the ballot examiner will mark the voided ballots and affix an
      official seal.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      9</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      counting and announcing the ballots, the ballot counting personnel are
      supervised by the ballot examiner, and the results are announced onsite by
      the Chairman.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      10</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company will give certificates of election to the elected Directors and
      Supervisors.</font></div>
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      11</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                </div>
                              </td>
                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">These
      Guidelines shall come into force given the approval of the shareholders&#8217;
      meeting, and so shall be the
amendment.</font></div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                        </table>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div><br></div>
        <div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

              <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

            </div>

            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 378pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: right" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font>Appendix III</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Articles
of Incorporation</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(before
revision)</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <div align="center">
            <div align="center">
              <div align="center">
                <div align="center">
                  <div align="center">
                    <div align="center">
                      <div align="center">
                        <div align="center">
                          <div align="center">
                            <div align="center">
                              <div align="center">
