                                                                  <div align="center">
                                                                    <div align="center">
                                                                      <div align="center">
                                                                        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td colspan="3" valign="top" width="100%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Chapter I</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#12288;</font>
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">General
      Rules</font></font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      1</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company is organized in accordance with the rules of The Company Act that
      governs companies limited by shares, and is named Advanced Semiconductor
      Engineering, Inc. in English.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      2</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      businesses operated by the Company:</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Manufacture,
      assembly, reprocessing, testing and export of integrated circuits of
      various types.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Research
      and development, design, manufacture, assembly, reprocessing, testing and
      export of various computer, electronic, communications and information
      products, as well as their peripherals and parts.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">General
      export/import trades, excluding businesses requiring special
      permission.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">CC01080
      Electronic components manufacturing industry</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">CC01990
      Other electrical, electronic and mechanical equipment manufacturing
      industry (IC lead frame, BGA substrate and FC substrate)</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">6.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">F119010
      Electronic material wholesale business</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">7.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">F219010
      Electronic material retail business</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">I199990
      Other consultant service (technological and consultant service of IC lead
      frame, BGA substrate and FC substrate)</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">9.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">I601010
      Leasing business</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">10.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Engagement
      in businesses that are not banned or restricted by law with the exception
      of businesses requiring permit.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      3</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Where
      the Company invests in another company as a limited liability shareholder,
      it is not subject to the restriction imposed by The Company Act providing
      that such investment shall not exceed a specified percentage of the total
      paid-in capital.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      4</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company may provide external guarantees.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      5</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company&#8217;s principal offices are located in the Nantz Processing Export
      Zone, Kaohsiung City, R.O.C. If necessary, branches, representative
      offices or operating offices may be established at other domestic/foreign
      locations given the resolution of the Board of Directors.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                        </table>
                                                                      </div>

                                                  <div align="center">
                                                    <div align="center">
                                                      <div align="center">
                                                        <div align="center">
                                                          <div align="center">
                                                            <div align="center">
                                                              <div align="center">
                                                                <div align="center">
                                                                  <table align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td colspan="3" valign="top" width="100%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Chapter
      II&#160;&#160;Shares</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      6</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      total capital of the Company is NT$80,000,000,000 divided into
      8,000,000,000 shares of NT$10 par value, within which NT$8,000,000,000 is
      reserved for issuance of employee stock option receipts. The board of
      directors is authorized to issue the unissued shares in batches according
      to business needs.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      7</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Share
      certificates of the Company are all registered in form, which shall be
      signed or affixed with seal by more than three directors as well as duly
      attested before they can be issued.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      8</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Title
      transfer of stocks shall all be suspended from within sixty days before
      the shareholders&#8217; general meeting is held, within thirty days before the
      shareholders&#8217; provisional meeting is held, or within five days before the
      basis date for distribution of stock dividends and bonuses or other
      benefits determined by the Company.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      9</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company&#8217;s processing rules of stock affairs shall fully comply with
      pertinent laws and regulations promulgated by the authorities
      concerned.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td colspan="3" valign="top" width="100%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Chapter
      III&#160;&#160;Shareholders&#8217; Meeting</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      10</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company&#8217; shareholders&#8217; meeting are divided into shareholders&#8217; general
      meeting and shareholders&#8217; provisional meeting. The general meeting is held
      once per year by the board of directors within six months after the end of
      each fiscal year according to law. The provisional meeting is convened
      when necessary according to law.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      11</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">To
      convene the shareholders&#8217; general meeting and the shareholders&#8217;
      provisional meeting, the Company shall inform each and every shareholder
      of the date, venue and purpose of convening the meeting thirty days and
      fifteen days respectively in advance before the meeting is
      held.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      12</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      otherwise provided by The Company Act, a resolution of the shareholders&#8217;
      meeting shall be adopted by the consent of more than one half of the votes
      represented by the shareholders present in a meeting attended by
      shareholders representing more than one half of the total issued
      shares.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      13</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                                                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                          </div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      specified in Article 179 of The Company Act whereas no voting right is
      entitled, a shareholder of the Company shall be entitled to one vote for
      each share held.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      14</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      a shareholder is unable to attend the shareholders&#8217; meeting for whatever
      the reason, he/she may present a proxy statement printed by the Company,
      stating therein the scope of authorization to entrust a proxy to appear on
      his/her behalf. The above proxy statement shall be delivered to the
      Company five days in advance before the shareholders&#8217; meeting is
      held.</font></div>
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                  </table>
                                                                  <div>&#160;</div>
                                                                  <div>&#160;</div>

                                                                        <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                                                                      </div>

                                                                  <table align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      15</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      otherwise provided by The Company Act, the shareholders&#8217; meeting shall be
      convened by the board of directors and presided by the chairperson of the
      board. If the chairperson is on leave or unable to perform his/her duties
      for whatever the reason, Article 208 Paragraph 3 of The Company Act shall
      govern. If the shareholders&#8217; meeting is convened by some person entitled
      to convene the meeting who is not a member of the board of directors, this
      person shall serve as the chairperson. Where there are two or more persons
      entitled to convene the meeting, one shall be nominated among them to
      serve as the chairperson.</font></div>
                                                                        </td>
                                                                      </tr>
                                                                  </table>

                                                                      <div align="center">
                                                                        <div align="center">
                                                                          <div align="center">
                                                                            <div align="center">
                                                                              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                                                  <tr>
                                                                                    <td colspan="3" valign="top" width="100%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Chapter
      IV&#160;&#160;Directors and Supervisors</font></div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                  </tr>
                                                                                  <tr>
                                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      16</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company shall have seven to nine Directors, of which there shall be two
      independent Directors and five to seven non-independent Directors, and
      also five to seven Supervisors to be elected by the shareholders&#8217; meeting
      from candidates with legal capacity. Each director and supervisor shall
      hold office for a term of three years, and may continue to serve in the
      office if re-elected.</font></div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">At
      the time of election of Directors and Supervisors, it should be handled
      according to Article 198 of the Company Act and the relevant laws and
      regulations.</font></div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">When
      handling the aforementioned election of Directors, the election of
      independent Directors and non-independent Directors should be held
      together, with the names of the elected separately calculated, and those
      that receive more ballots that represent voting rights will be elected as
      independent Directors or non-independent Directors.</font></div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                  </tr>
                                                                                  <tr>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      16(1):</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      election of the Company&#8217;s independent Directors uses the candidate
      nomination system. Shareholders and already holding 1% or more of the
      Company&#8217;s stock and the Board of Directors shall nominate a list of
      candidates for independent Director. After the Board of Directors examines
      the qualifications of the candidate(s) for serving as an independent
      Director, the names are sent to the Shareholder&#8217;s meeting for election. If
      the Shareholder&#8217;s Meeting is convened by another person with the authority
      to convene the meeting, after the person with the authority to convene the
      meeting examines the qualifications of the candidate(s) for serving as an
      independent Director, the names are sent to the Shareholder&#8217;s meeting for
      election. All matters regarding the acceptance method and announcement of
      the nomination of candidates for independent Director will be handled
      according to the Company Act, the Securities Exchange Law, and other
      relevant laws and regulations.</font></div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                  </tr>
                                                                                  <tr>
                                                                                    <td align="justify" nowrap valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      16(2):</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      remuneration of the Company&#8217;s independent Directors is set at NT$2 million
      per person annually. For those that do not serve a full year, it will be
      calculated in proportion to the number of days of the term that were
      actually served.</font></div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                  </tr>
                                                                                  <tr>
                                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      17</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                    <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      board of directors shall be organized by the directors whose functions are
      as follows:</font></div>
                                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;
      Preparing the business
plan.</font></div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                  </tr>
                                                                              </table>
                                                                            </div>
                                                                          </div>
                                                                        </div>
                                                                      </div>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                </div>
                                                              </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                          </div>
                                                        </div>
                                                      </div>
                                                    </div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </div>
                                              </div>
                                            </div>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                      </div>
                                    </div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
            <div>&#160;</div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">

                                                                    <div align="center">
                                                                      <div align="center">
                                                                        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;
      &#160; Making proposals regarding profit distribution or loss
      replenishment.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;
      &#160;&#160;Making proposals regarding capital
      increase/decrease.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(4)&#160;
      &#160;&#160;Reviewing and approving important rules and
      contracts.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(5)&#160;
      &#160;&#160;Appointing and dismissing the president of the
      Company.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(6)&#160;
      &#160;&#160;Establishing and dissolving branch organizations of the
      Company.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(7)&#160;&#160;
      &#160;Reviewing and approving budgets and actual budget.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(8)&#160;&#160;
      &#160;Other functions vested by The Company Act or by the resolution of
      the shareholders&#8217; meeting.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      18</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      board of directors shall be organized by the directors, among whom one
      director shall be elected as the chairperson by consent of more than one
      half of the directors present in a meeting attended by more than
      two-thirds of all directors, where one vice chairperson may also be
      elected among the directors. The chairperson represents the Company in
      public. When the chairperson is on leave or unable to exercise his/her
      official functions for whatever the reason, the acting chairperson shall
      be designated in accordance with Article 208 of The Company
      Act.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      19</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unless
      otherwise provided by The Company Act, the board meeting shall be convened
      by the chairperson according to law. The meeting may be held at any
      location at home, or by video conference.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      20</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">A
      director may present a written proxy statement to entrust another director
      as the proxy to attend the board meeting and exercise the voting right on
      his/her behalf, but each director may act as a proxy for only one other
      director.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td colspan="3" valign="top" width="100%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Chapter
      V Manager</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      21</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company shall have one president, whose appointment, dismissal and
      remuneration shall be handled in accordance with Article 29 of The Company
      Act.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td colspan="3" valign="top" width="100%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Chapter
      VI&#160;&#160;&#160;Accounting</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      22</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">      </font>
                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                </div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company&#8217;s fiscal year shall run from January 1 to December 31 each year.
      At the end of each fiscal year, the board of directors shall prepare the
      various statements and reports as required by The Company Act and submit
      them to the shareholders&#8217; general meeting for ratification according to
      law.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                            <tr>
                                                                              <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      23</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                              <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company&#8217;s net profits each year after the actual budget shall be
      distributed in the following order:</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Replenishment
      of losses.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Allocation
      of 10% as the legal surplus reserve.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Allocation
      of a special surplus reserve in accordance with laws or regulations set
      forth by the authorities concerned.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(4)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">For
      the unrealized portion of long-term investment profits calculated by the
      equity method that is not cash dividends, it may be listed as the special
      surplus reserve under the item of current profits, to be included for
      profit distribution after being realized.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                              </td>
                                                                            </tr>
                                                                        </table>
                                                                      </div>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                </div>
                                                              </div>

                                                      </div>

                <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">- 61 -</font></div>
                  <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                    <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
                  </div>
