                    <div align="center">
                      <div align="center">
                        <div align="left">
                          <div align="left">
                            <div align="left">
                              <div align="left">
                                <div align="left">
                                  <div align="center">
                                    <div align="left">
                                      <div align="left">
                                        <div align="left">
                                          <div align="left">
                                            <div align="center">
                                              <div align="left">
                                                <div align="left">
                                                  <div align="left">
                                                    <div align="left">
                                                      <div align="left">
                                                        <div align="left">
                                                          <div align="center">
                                                            <div align="left">
                                                              <div align="justify">
                                                                <div align="justify">
                                                                  <div align="center">
                                                                    <div align="left">
                                                                      <div align="left">
                                                                        <div align="left">
                                                                          <div align="center">
                                                                            <div align="left">
                                                                              <div align="center">
                                                                                <div align="left">
                                                                                  <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                                                      <tr>
                                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Any
      remaining profits, if any, shall be distributed as follows:</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)&#160; </font></font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Allocation
      of 2%, inclusive, or less from the balance after the amounts mandated by
      Subparagraphs 1 to 4 above have been deducted as the remuneration for
      directors and supervisors.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(6)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Allocation
      of 7% to 10% from the balance after the amounts mandated by Subparagraphs
      1 to 4 above have been deducted as the bonuses for employees. The 7%
      portion is distributed to all employees in accordance with the Rules of
      Bonus to Employees Distribution, and the board of directors is delegated
      with the authority to set separate rules for distribution of the portion
      in excess of 7% to specific employees for their specific contributions to
      the Company.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(7)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      board of directors shall be delegated to draw up a plan to distribute the
      remaining profits to shareholders pro rata according to the percentage of
      shares held by each S\shareholder.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Employees
      referred to in Subparagraph 6 of the preceding paragraph include employees
      of subsidiary companies that meet certain conditions, which are to be
      prescribed by the board of directors.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                      </tr>
                                                                                      <tr>
                                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      24</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company is currently in the business growth stage. To meet the capital
      needs for business development now and in the future and satisfy the
      requirements of shareholders for cash inflow, the Company&#8217;s dividend
      policy shall use residual dividend policy to distribute dividends, of
      which the cash dividend distribution rate is 0%&#8211;50% of the total dividend
      amount, with the remainder to be distributed as stock dividends. However,
      depending on factors such as the economic situation, business development,
      and cash position holdings, the Company shall adjust the cash dividend and
      stock dividend distribution rate when necessary with a surplus
      distribution plan made by the Board of Directors and passed by resolution
      of the Shareholders&#8217; Meeting.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                      </tr>
                                                                                      <tr>
                                                                                        <td colspan="3" valign="top" width="100%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Chapter
      VII&#160;&#160;Supplementary Provisions</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                      </tr>
                                                                                      <tr>
                                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      25</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Articles of Incorporation and By-Laws of the Company shall be separately
      established.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                      </tr>
                                                                                      <tr>
                                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      26</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Any
      matters that are not completely provided by the Articles of Incorporation
      shall be handled in accordance with The Company Act.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                      </tr>
                                                                                      <tr>
                                                                                        <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      27</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">:</font></div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                        <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Articles of Incorporation were established by the organizers&#8217; meeting
      under the agreement of all organizers on March 11, 1984, and the first
      amendment was made on May 3, 1984.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      first amendment was made on May 3, 1984.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      second amendment was made on June 11, 1984.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      third amendment was made on June 25, 1984.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      fourth amendment was made on May 28, 1986.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      fifth amendment was made on July 10, 1986.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      sixth amendment was made on August 15, 1987.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      seventh amendment was made on May 28, 1988.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      eighth amendment was made on July 18, 1988.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      ninth amendment was made on September 1, 1988.</font></div>
                                                                                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                        </td>
                                                                                      </tr>
                                                                                  </table>
                                                                                </div>
                                                                              </div>
                                                                            </div>
                                                                          </div>
                                                                        </div>
                                                                      </div>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                </div>
                                                              </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                          </div>
                                                        </div>
                                                      </div>
                                                    </div>

                                                                                              <tr>
                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="9%">&#160;</td>
                                                                                                <td valign="top" width="3%">
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                <td valign="top" width="88%">
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      tenth amendment was made on October 30, 1988.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      eleventh amendment was made on November 24, 1988.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twelfth amendment was made on December 5, 1988.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirteenth amendment was made on February 21, 1989.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      fourteenth amendment was made on December 11, 1989.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      fifteenth amendment was made on March 31, 1990.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      sixteenth amendment was made on March 30, 1991.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      seventeenth amendment was made on April 11, 1992.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      eighteenth amendment was made on April 28, 1993.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      nineteenth amendment was made on March 21, 1994.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twentieth amendment was made on March 21, 1995.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-first amendment was made on April 8, 1996.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-second amendment was made on April 12, 1997.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-third amendment was made on March 21, 1998.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-fourth amendment was made on June 9, 1999.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-fifth amendment was made on July 11, 2000.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-sixth amendment was made on June 1, 2001.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-seventh amendment was made on June 21, 2002.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-eighth amendment was made on June 21, 2002.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      twenty-ninth amendment was made on June 19, 2003.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirtieth amendment was made on June 19, 2003.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-first amendment was made on June 15, 2004</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-second amendment was made on June 30, 2005.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-third amendment was made on June 21, 2006.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fourth amendment was made on June 28, 2007.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty- fifth amendment was made on June 19, 2008.</font></div>
                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                              </tr>

            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        <div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Appendix IV</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Status
of Holdings by Directors and Supervisors</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="left">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Pursuant
to Article 26 of the Securities Trading Act, the minimum number of shares
required to be held by all directors of the Company is 109,470,598 shares, and
the minimum number of shares required to be held by all supervisors of the
Company is 10,947,060 shares.</font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
share-holding status of individuals and all directors and supervisors of the
Company recorded on the Register of Shareholders as of the beginning date when
ownership transfer stops for the shareholders&#8217; meeting (April 27, 2009) is as
follows:</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: right" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">April 27,
2009&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div>
          <div align="center">
            <div align="center">
              <div align="center">
                <div align="center">
                  <div align="center">
                    <div align="center">
                      <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="88%">
                          <tr>
                            <td rowspan="2" valign="middle" width="12%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Title</font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td rowspan="2" valign="middle" width="38%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Name</font></div>
                            </td>
                            <td colspan="2" valign="middle" width="38%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Current
      Holdings</font></div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>

shareholders&#8217; meeting, the number of shares held by all directors of the Company
is 1,080,933,617 shares in total, which complies with Article 26 of the
Securities Trading Act.</font></div>

2:&#160;&#160; Until the date when ownership transfer stops for the
shareholders&#8217; meeting, the number of shares held by all supervisors of the
Company is 87,914,231 shares in total, which complies with Article 26 of the
Securities Trading Act.</font></div>

            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        <div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9632;</font>Appendix V</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Information
Concerning Employee Bonus and Information Remuneration for Directors and
Supervisors</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Company&#8217;s 2008 earnings distribution proposal was passed by resolution fo the
Board of Directors on April 8, 2009, and the proposed earnings distribution
situation as passed by the Board of Directors is as follows:</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;
Distribution of employee cash bonus of NT$554,404,000.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;
Distribution of director and supervisor remuneration of NT$
88,800,000.</font></div>
        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;
The difference between the aforementioned planned amounts to be allocated and
the already expensed employee bonuses of NT$554,404,451 and director and
supervisor remuneration of NT$110,881,090 is a total of
NT$22,081,541.</font></div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
Reason for the difference: The expensed amounts are an estimation based on the
Company&#8217;s issuance in recent years. Concerning the proposed amounts passed by
the Board of Directors, the board members decided to reduce the amount of
director and supervisor remuneration in light of the poor economic climate, in
order to share the burden and help reduce the Company&#8217;s operating
costs.</font></div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;Handling of the difference: It is planned for the difference to be
recognized as a change in accounting estimates, after being passed by the
Shareholders&#8217; Meeting.</font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Impact

                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td align="left" rowspan="3" valign="middle" width="15%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Status
      of distribution of shares and dividends for the year in
      question</font></div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(Note
      1, Note 2)</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="middle" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Cash
      dividend per share (NT$)</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td valign="middle" width="13%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">0.5</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="middle" width="35%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">

      of shares distributed for each share in earned surplusturned capital

                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="6%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Note
      1:</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="94%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Subject
      to the resolution by the 2009 Shareholders&#8217; General Meeting.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="6%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Note
      2:</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="94%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      shareholders&#8217; bonus distributed this time totaled NT$2,736,568,447, was
      all distributed in cash at NT$0.5 per share. With respect to the
      above-mentioned cash dividend rate, the calculation was based on the
      5,473,136,894 shares registered in the roster of shareholders as of March
      26, 2009, subtracting the treasury stock
</font></div>
                  </td>

          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
          <div>
            <div align="justify">
              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                    <td valign="top" width="6%">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="94%">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">bought
      back by the Company. Later, if the Company&#8217;s ECB holders exercise the
      right of conversion, or new shares issued to employees against Employee
      Stock Option warrant, or new shares issued by the Company for a cash
      capital increase, or buyback of the Company&#8217;s stocks, or transfer or
      cancellation of the Company&#8217;s treasury stocks, which affect the cash
      distribution rate of the shareholders&#8217; bonus, requiring adjustment, the
      management will request the shareholders&#8217; meeting to authorize the board
      of directors to handle the situation plenipotentiarily and make the
      adjustment accordingly.</font></div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    </td>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                    <td valign="top" width="6%">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Note
      3:</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="94%">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">According
      to the &#8220;Guidance Concerning Handling of Financial Forecast Information of
      Public Companies&#8221;, the Company is not required to disclose its 2009
      financial forecast.</font></div>
                    </td>

            <tr>
              <td align="left" nowrap width="100%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 4px double; BORDER-TOP: black 4px double; BORDER-LEFT: black 4px double; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 26pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif">Summary
      of Corporate<br>Governance
Differences</font></font></div>
              </td>

      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">

    <div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
      <div><br>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">COMPARISON
OF NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE CORPORATE GOVERNANCE RULES AND OUR CORPORATE
GOVERNANCE PRACTICES</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As a
company listed on the New York Stock Exchange (the &#8220;NYSE&#8221;), we are subject to
certain corporate governance rules of the NYSE.&#160;&#160;The application of
the NYSE&#8217;s corporate governance rules is limited for foreign private issuers,
recognizing that they have to comply with domestic requirements.&#160;&#160;As a
foreign private issuer, we must comply with the following NYSE corporate
governance rules: 1) satisfy the audit committee requirements of the United
States Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;SEC&#8221;); 2) chief executive
officer must promptly notify the NYSE in writing upon becoming aware of any
material non-compliance with applicable NYSE corporate governance rules; 3)
submit annual and interim affirmations to the NYSE regarding compliance with
applicable NYSE corporate governance requirements; and 4) provide a brief
description of any significant differences between our corporate governance
practices and those required of U.S. companies under the NYSE listing
standards.&#160;&#160;The table below sets forth the significant differences
between our corporate governance practices and those required of U.S. companies
under the NYSE listing standards.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <div align="left">
            <div align="left">
              <div align="left">
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left">
                    <div align="left">
                      <div align="left">
                        <div align="left">
                          <div align="left">
                            <div align="left">
                              <div align="left">
                                <div align="left">
                                  <div align="left">
                                    <div align="left">
                                      <div align="left">
                                        <div align="left">
                                          <div align="left">
                                            <div align="left">
                                              <div align="left">
                                                <div align="left">
                                                  <div align="left">
                                                    <div align="left">
                                                      <div align="left">
                                                        <div align="left">
                                                          <div align="left">
                                                            <div align="left">
                                                              <div align="left">
                                                                <div align="left">
                                                                  <div align="left">
                                                                    <div align="left">
                                                                      <div align="left">
                                                                        <div align="left">
                                                                          <div align="left">
                                                                            <div align="left">
                                                                              <div align="left">
                                                                                <div align="left">
                                                                                  <div align="left">
                                                                                    <div align="left">
                                                                                      <div align="left">
                                                                                        <div align="left">
                                                                                          <div align="left">
                                                                                            <div align="left">
                                                                                              <div align="left">
                                                                                                <div align="left">
                                                                                                  <div align="left">
                                                                                                    <div align="left">
                                                                                                      <div align="left">
                                                                                                        <div align="left">
                                                                                                          <div align="left">
                                                                                                            <div align="left">
                                                                                                              <div align="left">
                                                                                                                <div align="left">
                                                                                                                  <div align="left">
                                                                                                                    <div align="left">
                                                                                                                      <div align="left">
                                                                                                                        <div align="left">
                                                                                                                          <div align="left">
                                                                                                                            <div align="left">
                                                                                                                              <div align="left">
                                                                                                                                <div align="left">
                                                                                                                                  <div align="left">
                                                                                                                                    <div align="left">
                                                                                                                                      <div align="left">
                                                                                                                                        <div align="left">
                                                                                                                                          <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                                                                                                                              <tr>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">New
      York Stock Exchange Corporate Governance Rules Applicable to U.S.
      Companies</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                                                                                                                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Description
      of Significant Differences between Our Governance Practices and the NYSE
      Corporate Governance Rules Applicable to U.S. Companies</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                              </tr>
                                                                                                                                              <tr>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Director
      independence</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                                                                                                                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                                                                                              </tr>
                                                                                                                                              <tr>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Listed
      companies must have a majority of independent directors, as defined under
      the NYSE listing standards.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                                                                                                                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">One
      member of our board of directors is independent as defined in Rule 10A-3
      under the United States Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the
      &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;). We do not assess the independence of our directors under
      the independence requirements of the NYSE listing standards.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to relevant laws and regulations of the Republic of China (the &#8220;ROC&#8221;), we
      have two independent directors on our board of directors that were elected
      through the candidate nomination system at our annual general shareholders
      meeting on June 25, 2009.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                              </tr>
                                                                                                                                              <tr>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">To
      empower non-management directors to serve as a more effective check on
      management, the non-management directors of each company must meet at
      regularly scheduled executive sessions without management.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                                                                                                                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">All
      of our directors attend the meetings of the board of
      directors.&#160;&#160;Our non-management directors do not meet at
      regularly scheduled executive sessions without management.&#160;&#160;The
      ROC Company Law does not require companies incorporated in the ROC to have
      their non-management directors meet at regularly scheduled executive
      sessions without management.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                              </tr>
                                                                                                                                              <tr>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Nominating/Corporate
      governance committee</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                                                                                                                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                                                                                              </tr>
                                                                                                                                              <tr>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Listed
      companies must have a nominating/corporate governance committee composed
      entirely of independent directors and governed by a written charter that
      provides for certain responsibilities of the committee set out in the NYSE
      listing standards.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                                                                                                                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">We
      do not have a nominating/corporate governance committee.&#160;&#160;The
      ROC Company Law does not require companies incorporated in the ROC to have
      a nominating/corporate governance committee.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Currently,
      our board of directors performs the duties of a corporate governance
      committee and regularly reviews our corporate governance principles and
      practices.</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                                                                                                                                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      ROC Company Law requires that directors be elected by
      shareholders.&#160;&#160;Under ROC law and regulations, companies that
      have independent directors are required to adopt a candidate nomination
      system for the election of independent directors.&#160;&#160;Our two
      independent directors were elected through the candidate nomination system
      provided in our articles of
</font></div>
                                                                                                                                                </td>
                                                                                                                                              </tr>
                                                                                                                                          </table>
                                                                                                                                        </div>
                                                                                                                                      </div>
                                                                                                                                    </div>
                                                                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                                                                </div>
                                                                                                                              </div>
                                                                                                                            </div>
                                                                                                                          </div>
                                                                                                                        </div>
                                                                                                                      </div>
                                                                                                                    </div>
                                                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                                                </div>
                                                                                                              </div>
                                                                                                            </div>
                                                                                                          </div>
                                                                                                        </div>
                                                                                                      </div>
                                                                                                    </div>
                                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                                                              </div>
                                                                                            </div>
                                                                                          </div>
                                                                                        </div>
                                                                                      </div>
                                                                                    </div>
                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                </div>
                                                                              </div>
                                                                            </div>

          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
